summary: The diff shows a partial overwrite of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with new UI code (including a `DATA` constant and an orbital-style `CoreNav` component) plus significant updates to `frontend/src/index.css` (adding animation keyframes/utilities). However, due to truncation and missing evidence (notably no visible Framer Motion imports/`layoutId` usage, no visible category slider/filtering logic, and no visible Landing→Client→Pro/GenesisEngine flow), multiple REQ-86 acceptance criteria cannot be verified and may be missing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use Framer Motion shared `layoutId` to morph a compact salon card into a full-screen expanded view in the Client Home tab (no route/page navigation).
missing_requirements.reason: In the visible portion of `AppV1.jsx`, there is no import from `framer-motion` and no evidence of `layoutId` usage; truncation prevents confirming it exists later in the file.
evidence: frontend/src/AppV1.jsx (truncated snippet shows imports from `lucide-react` only; no `framer-motion` import or `layoutId` visible)

missing_requirements.requirement: Include the top category slider that controls filtering immediately, per the provided V24 styling/behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated snippet shows `DATA` and `CoreNav`, but no category slider UI or filtering logic is visible; cannot confirm it was implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Completely replace `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact V24 “OMEGA SINGULARITY” code provided by the user (verbatim, no refactors/additions), including the full Landing → Client → Pro/GenesisEngine flow.
missing_requirements.reason: The file is truncated, so it is not possible to verify it is an exact full overwrite or that the full multi-stage flow (Landing/Client/Pro/GenesisEngine) is present and matches the provided V24 code exactly.
evidence: frontend/src/AppV1.jsx (content truncated; only partial components/data visible)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the project compiles after the overwrite with only minimal mechanical fixes (e.g., fix missing imports/unresolved symbols) without changing intended behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: Because `AppV1.jsx` is truncated and shows no Framer Motion import despite REQ-86 requiring it, there is insufficient evidence that all required imports/symbols are resolved and that the build succeeds.
evidence: frontend/src/AppV1.jsx (truncated at a `<b` tag, suggesting incomplete visibility of JSX correctness)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded global CSS animation utilities and keyframes (fade/scale/slide/breathing/orbital-expand etc.) beyond the explicit requirement to overwrite `AppV1.jsx`.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-86/REQ-87 focus on overwriting `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and only making minimal mechanical fixes; a large update to `frontend/src/index.css` is not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest diff-scoped requirements.
The BuildRequest requirements are specific to `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` (and minimal compile fixes). Changing these summary/metadata files is not requested.
